title: Best places to study on campus?
author: Maria Rodriguez
content: Hi everyone! I'm new to UQ and looking for quiet study spots. Any recommendations for places with good WiFi and comfortable seating?

replies_content.author: James Park
replies_content.content: The Law Library on level 3 is usually quiet and has great views!

replies_content.author: Sarah Chen
replies_content.content: I love the Biological Sciences Library - lots of natural light and comfy chairs.

title: Looking for housemates in Toowong
author: David Lee
content: I found a great 3-bedroom house near Toowong station. Looking for 2 housemates. Rent is $200/week including utilities. Close to UQ and city!

replies_content.author: Emma Thompson
replies_content.content: Interested! When can I come for a viewing?

title: Cultural shock - anyone else struggling?
author: Wei Chen
content: I've been here for 3 months and still feel overwhelmed sometimes. The academic system is so different from back home. Anyone else feeling this way?

replies_content.author: Lisa Wang
replies_content.content: You're not alone! It took me 6 months to feel comfortable. Join the international student support group - it really helps.

replies_content.author: Tom Anderson
replies_content.content: I felt the same way. The key is to be patient with yourself and reach out for help when you need it.

title: Best cheap eats near campus?
author: Anna Martinez
content: Student budget is tight! What are your favorite affordable restaurants and food spots near UQ?

replies_content.author: Michael Brown
replies_content.content: The Vietnamese place on Hawken Drive has amazing pho for $12!

replies_content.author: Sophie Chen
replies_content.content: UQ Union food court has student discounts. The sushi place is pretty good.

title: Group study for Economics 101
author: James Park
content: Anyone interested in forming a study group for Economics 101? We could meet weekly to review lectures and work on assignments together.

replies_content.author: Maria Rodriguez
replies_content.content: Count me in! I'm struggling with the microeconomics concepts.

title: Weekend trip to Gold Coast - anyone interested?
author: Emma Thompson
content: Planning a day trip to Gold Coast this weekend. Looking for travel buddies to split costs and have fun together!
